title: Online Blended Learning Design Strategies Based on Social Constructivism and UDL

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing enhanced competency in designing blended online classes for social studies subjects for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more interaction activities based on socioconstructivist principles in online environments.
Learners will be able to explain how to create accessible mobile learning content in accordance with UDL principles
Learners will be able to design project-based assessment tasks utilizing collaborative tools in Sakai LMS/VLE

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
